In three sentences
Comments
This school has great safety.
WSCU is always having student activities.
Outdoor lovers and students looking for a great education.
All freshman are encouraged to ride the rapids down the river the first week of school. This is really the first social we have that allows freshman to meet other freshman.
The education is great and we are located in a beautiful area.
I am on the football team here at WSCU and love my new friends. When not busy with school or football i love to go fishing or skiing. We have one of the best ski areas withing thirty minutes of us.
The cafeteria food is not as bad as most people will tell you. Outside of campus food there are some really great places for cheeseburgers and pastas.
I was nervous about the dorms when i first arrived here. However it did not take long for me to meet a lot of new people. I have also met my incredible life long friends.

Academics here surpassed my expectations. Being a smaller Division two school the student here have a great opportunity to get connected with their teachers and have more of a closer education than any big school.

Western state gives a great opportunity to learn closely with teachers and help keep you on track for graduation. While playing sports does cause athletes to miss school, teachers are great about getting you caught up.
WSCU is a great school for outdoor lovers. Skiing, hiking, fishing and pretty much anything you can think of. The sports teams here are really starting to compete at a high level.
pageTitle: Western State Colorado University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {111183=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 3147=The teachers from Western State are voted the best of the state of Colorado. The teacher to student ratio is 20:1. Since the school and class sizes are small, you receive a lot of one-on-one action and the teachers make sure you know the material before moving on. I have learned so much that I bipassed in high school. The teachers teach subjects in a way that in interesting and attention grabbing. You will never get bored and will be excited to go to class the next time.}

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here If you are looking for adventure, you couldn't find a better place. The town is like one big close-knit community. There are two ski areas within an hour from here. Great views of the mountains that are all around us. Especially when they are covered with snow! The campus is really small, about a five minute walk to get to any class. There are about 2,700 kids and you get to know most of them, which I really like. Am learning a lot I love the classes I am taking this year. Everything is always interesting. The teachers always explain everything they are teaching. They have great teaching methods and great personalities. You can always relate to the teachers on a personal level and they are pretty much always available to help you whenever you need it. Login to rate or flag the reviews Beverly from Estes Park, CO 06/30/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 24
